typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Transaction ID} as integer,
		Customer as string,
		Name as string,
		Zip as string,
		Product as string,
		MSRP as double,
		Quantity as short,
		Total as double,
		Date as date 'MM/dd/yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesData
SalesData aggregate(groupBy(Customer),
	each(match(name!='Customer'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctRows
DistinctRows select(mapColumn(
		Customer,
		Name,
		Zip
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCustomerColumns
SelectCustomerColumns derive({Source System} = 'Two Wheels') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	insertHttpMethod: 'PATCH',
	timeout: 30,
	headers: ['x-api-key' -> '7cd70af83611405ea394c80d16535499'],
	requestFormat: ['type' -> 'json'],
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		TwoWheelsID = Customer,
		Name,
		Zip,
		{Source System}
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4),
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: []) ~> OutputDistinctCustomers
